name: Ball Rolling (EthanJShellard)
description:
This is a short game made for the Programming for Interaction module of the Games Software Engineering Bsc from Bournemouth University.

It has full controller support.

A debug key is still active in this release - you can use delete to skip to the next level.

_______________________________________________________________________________________
